definition: A person who is involved in the construction industry, typically engaged in physical labor and tasks related to building structures, roads, or other infrastructure projects. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who work as laborers or workers on construction sites.

examples.english: The construction worker is wearing a helmet.

examples.german: Die Bauarbeiter arbeiten an einem neuen Gebäude.
examples.english: The construction workers are working on a new building.
The construction worker is using a shovel.
The construction workers are wearing safety shoes.

examples.german: Der Bauarbeiter ist auf einer Baustelle beschäftigt.
examples.english: The construction worker is employed at a construction site.
